title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Virtual Reality-Based Motivational Interviewing Training for Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical counseling skills and understanding of patient communication
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply the 4 core motivational interviewing techniques (open-ended questions, affirmative feedback, etc.) with ≥80% accuracy via virtual patient simulations
Learners effectively manage patient resistance emotions ≥75% of the time across 3 role-play scenarios
Learners demonstrate ≥0.5-point improvement (4-point scale) in motivational interviewing self-efficacy via post-program self-assessment surveys

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
